ch.unibas.bsc.detapp.actor

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • ch.unibas.bsc.detapp.actor.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObject

    public class Player
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
implements GameObject
    Core gaming class as it reassembles the player. Contains logic handling collisions, jumps and lane switches.

      • isJumping

        public boolean isJumping()
        Returns whether the player is currently jumping.
        Returns:
        boolean representing the jump state.

      • jump

        public boolean jump()
        Lets the player jump. Also starts timeout thread to pull the player back down to the ground if type of jumping it not set to JumpTypes.CONTINUOUS. Otherwise the player can jump as long as he exceeds a given sensor threshold.
        Returns:
        true if player was not jumping; false if player was already jumping.

      • stopJump

        public void stopJump()
        Stops a jump if the player is currently jumping.

      • switchRight

        public void switchRight()
        Moves a player to the next lane to it's right. Also checks that the freezePowerDown is not active.

      • switchLeft

        public void switchLeft()
        Moves a player to the next lane to it's left. Also checks that the freezePowerDown is not active.
